sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import styles from "./custom.module.css" ; import axios from 'axios'; class Register extends Component { state = { username: '', password: '', Confirmpassword: '', email: '', phone: '', emailError:'' } valid(){ if(!this.state.emailError.includes("@")){ this.setState({emailError:"invalid email address"}) return false; } return true; } handleSubmit = e => { if(this.valid()){ e.preventDefault(); let formData = new FormData(); formData.append("username",this.state.username); formData.append("password",this.state.password); formData.append("Confirmpassword",this.state.Confirmpassword); formData.append("email",this.state.email); formData.append("phone",this.state.phone); const url="http://localhost:8080/register"; axios.post(url,formData) .then(res=> window.location= "/contacts" ) .catch(err=> window.location= "/register"); } } render() { return (

CONTACTS

User Name: this.setState({ username: e.target.value })} />


Password: this.setState({ password: e.target.value })}/>


Confirm Password: this.setState({ Confirmpassword: e.target.value })}/>


EMAIL: this.setState({ email: e.target.value })}/>

{this.state.emailError}



PHONE: this.setState({ phone: e.target.value })}/>


About us

This application displays you the contact details of all the users who are using this application.Thanks for using our application. Hope you have liked our application.Please feel free to contact us for any further help!

); } } export default Register;
